content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5, y=-53.5 and x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
- Examples: burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0), burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5), burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Errors when using stone furnaces
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before using them
- Example: stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Errors when using boilers and steam engines
- Ensure that boilers have fuel before using them
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network
- Examples: boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before using them
- Examples: pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network
- Example: electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty before using them
- Example: belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables defined by the agent were found in the execution logs.
